scripts.uglify: cat source.js | uglifyjs -c unused=false | tee minified.js | jscrush > crushed.js && wc -c *.js
scripts.closure: cat source.js | curl -d compilation_level=ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS -d output_format=text -d output_info=compiled_code --data-urlencode "js_code@-" http://closure-compiler.appspot.com/compile | tee minified.js | jscrush > minified.js && wc -c *.js
